function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Varying success rates of policies based on location, density, and cultural practices.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in areas with low policy success rates.","Mitigation":"Tailoring policies to fit the specific characteristics of each location and increasing awareness and acceptance of policies among the public.","Technologies":"Effective communication tools and community engagement platforms.","People":"Common public in different locations.","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Lack of research on pandemic governance.","Impact":"Inadequate preparedness and response to future pandemics.","Mitigation":"Conducting more research on pandemic governance and incorporating it into policy development.","Technologies":"Data analytics, surveillance systems, and public health research tools.","People":"Researchers, policymakers, government agencies.","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies."},{"Description":"Limitation of the study to only architectural, urban, and public realm scales.","Impact":"Neglect of other fields' influence on disease mitigation and prevention strategies.","Mitigation":"Collaborating with experts from other fields to create comprehensive disease mitigation and prevention strategies.","Technologies":"Interdisciplinary research and data integration platforms.","People":"Experts from various fields, public health professionals.","Owner":"Research institutions, interdisciplinary organizations."}]}
